body.p:
Department of the Interior
Washington March 26th 1862
His Excellency
Beriah Magoffin
Governor of the State of Kentucky
Sir

In a communication of 9th July 1861, I notified you that under the Law of May 23d 1850 the State of Kentucky was entitled to Eight (8) Members in the House of Representatives of the Thirty-Eighth Congress,

I have the honor to inform you that a Law was enacted on the 4th of March 1862 increasing the number of Representatives for certain States including the State of Kentucky, whereby that State is entitled to nine (9) Representatives in the Thirty Eighth and subsequent Congresses.

Very Respectfully
Caleb B Smith
Secretary
